item.description:
SCSU Theater Dept and Cresecent Players will be preforming in:::: The Rocky Horror Picture Show

By Richard O’Brien
Book, Music & Lyrics by Richard O’Brien
Directed and Choreographed by Larry Nye

That sweet transvestite & his motley crew did the time warp on Broadway in a 25th anniversary revival. Complete with sass from the audience, cascading toilet paper and an array of other audience participation, this deliberately kitschy rock ’n’ roll si-fi gothic is more fun than ever.

Tickets: $10.00 General Public plus convenience fee which brings the total to $11.50


$5 Students and Senior Citizens (Plus a convenience fee I'm sure)
Seating: General Admission

***You are on your own now to purchase your tickets. ***

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: OMG! The Rocky Horror Picture Show!
